Detailed Description

This class treats a terrain block as an obstacle.

When terrain clips, it should use the bounding box of the currently loaded height map, or there will be misses.

bool ChunkTerrainObstacle::collide ( const Vector3 &  start,
const Vector3 &  end,
CollisionState &  cs 
) const [virtual]

This method collides the input ray with the terrain block.

start and end should be inside (or on the edges of) our bounding box.

Parameters:
start The start of the ray.
end The end of the ray.
cs Collision state holder.

Implements ChunkObstacle.
